name: Curve 3EUR Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains agEUR, EURT, and EURS. agEUR is a synthetic Euro issued by [Angle Protocol](https://angle.money), while EURS and EURT are both centralized, hard-pegged Euro tokens issued by Stasis and Tether, respectively.

This pool contains agEUR, EURT, and EURS. agEUR is a synthetic Euro issued by [Angle Protocol](https://angle.money), while EURS and EURT are both centralized, hard-pegged Euro tokens issued by Stasis and Tether, respectively.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu havuz agEUR, EURT ve EURS içerir. agEUR, [Angle Protocol](https://angle.money) tarafından verilen sentetik bir Euro'dur, EURS ve EURT ise sırasıyla Stasis ve Tether tarafından verilen merkezi, sabit sabitlenmiş Euro jetonlarıdır.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains agEUR, EURT, and EURS. agEUR is a synthetic Euro issued by [Angle Protocol](https://angle.money), while EURS and EURT are both centralized, hard-pegged Euro tokens issued by Stasis and Tether, respectively.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 agEUR, EURT, and EURS。agEUR 是由 [Angle Protocol](https://angle.money) 发行的合成欧元，EURT 和 EURS 都是中心化的欧元稳定币，分别由 Stasis 和 Tether 发行。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve लिक्विडिटी पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में भी जमा कर सकते हैं। इस पूल में agEUR, EURT और EURS शामिल हैं। agEUR एक सिंथेटिक यूरो है जिसे [Angle Protocol](https://angle.money) द्वारा जारी किया गया है, जबकि EURS और EURT दोनों क्रमशः Stasis और Tether द्वारा जारी केंद्रीकृत, हार्ड-पेग्ड यूरो टोकन हैं।
